comments.comment: The fix correctly addresses the namespace import issues by using Aula.Configuration.Child instead of the removed Aula.Core.Models.Child. This maintains the architectural integrity of the recent refactoring where authentication clients are standalone with hardcoded URLs.
The removal of MinUddannelseClientTests.cs is appropriate since the MinUddannelseClient class was deleted in favor of PerChildMinUddannelseClient as the orchestration facade.

The constructor signature updates for PictogramAuthenticatedClient and PerChildMinUddannelseClient align properly with the architectural decision to remove Config parameters from authentication clients.
